content.title: 州は小さなツアーグループを誘致するために働く - スターオンライン
content.desc: PERAK wants to promote more tour packages to cater to small tour groups. State Tourism, Arts and Culture Committee chairman Tan Kar Hing (PH-Simpang Pulai) said there were several niche markets in the state that could attract these smaller groups, most likely comprising friends and families. “Based on research done by the state, we want to reposition Perak tourism by focusing on repositioning, rebranding and segmentation. “Perak has various eco-tourism spots, historical monuments and theme parks that will attract the smaller groups. It will be aptly named the Friends and Family Tourism prog...

content.title: ペラMBは彼を転倒させるためにプロットに対して何もしない
content.desc: Malaysiakini Perak Menteri Besar Ahmad Faizal Azumu said he is not taking any action on the claim of a plot to topple him and leaving the matter to the discretion of the authorities concerned to investigate. The State Pakatan Harapan chairperson said he did not see any wrongdoing by the state executive council (exco) members that were alleged by state opposition leader Saarani Mohamad to be in a plot to topple him. "We don't see any wrongdoing within the exco members or Harapan members, so why do we need to take any action... but if the authorities, like MACC and the police think that there is any wrong...

content.title: 2018年の観光客の増加 - スターオンライン
content.desc: THE Perak government is expecting an increase of 6% in domestic tourists to the state for 2018. State Tourism, Arts and Culture Committee chairman Tan Kar Hing said in 2017, a total of 7.6 million domestic tourists visited Perak. Tan said Perak was still in second place in terms of domestic tourist arrivals since 2015. “However, the statistics on tourists for this year cannot be shown as yet, because a report will only be available in mid-June next year,” he said in reply to Mohd Akmal Kamarudin (Umno-Selama) at the state assembly. Mohd Akmal had asked about the state government’s target of...

content.title: ペラックMBは、彼を転覆させようとしている疑惑の上でMACCを支援しようとしている -  The Star Online
content.desc: IPOH: Perak Mentri Besar Datuk Seri Ahmad Faizal Azumu is willing to assist the Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission (MACC) in the investigation over the plot to topple him. However, he doubt he would be able to help much in the probe. “I have no problems if I am called. I am good with everyone,” he told reporters after opening a seminar for local councillors here. Ahmad Faizal said he could only tell MACC what he knew, and what the media has informed him. He was commenting on reports about Perak opposition leader Datuk Saarani Mohamad claiming that Perak DAP vice-chairman Dr Abdul Aziz Bar...

content.title: ペラックのMBに対する誇大宣伝の誇大宣伝
content.desc: IPOH: The anticipated vote of no confidence against Perak Mentri Besar Datuk Seri Ahmad Faizal Azumu (pic) did not materialise at the end of the six-day state assembly sitting. Perak DAP chairman Nga Kor Ming said this was due to the united support by all the state’s Pakatan Harapan assemblymen for Ahmad Faizal. He added that there was no move to topple Ahmad Faizal, and that the opposition was merely making an attempt to create chaos in Perak. “Today (Wednesday) is the last day of the state assembly sitting and Ahmad Faizal is still the Perak Mentri Besar. “This is proof that the state opp...

content.title: ペラックMB：MAPSを販売する予定はない - スターオンライン
content.desc: IPOH: The Perak government has no plans to sell the Movie Animation Park Studio (MAPS), says Perak Mentri Besar Datuk Seri Ahmad Faizal Azumu (pic). Ahmad Faizal was responding to Nga Kor Ming (DAP-Aulong) who suggested that the government should sell the state-owned theme park to private companies during today’s assembly sitting. “I welcome all suggestions from state assembly members, but I believe he did not receive the latest information about MAPS. The theme park is doing well. They have received an increasing number of visitors coming in," said Ahmad Faizal. He added that the park coul...

content.title: アブドゥル・アジズ・バーリ：私はペラックを追い払うつもりはない。MB  - スター・オンライン
content.desc: IPOH: Perak DAP vice-chairman Dr Abdul Aziz Bari (pic) has denied he is the state executive councillor out to topple the Mentri Besar. Denying Datuk Saarani Mohamad's allegations, Abdul Aziz said the Perak opposition leader can be considered as having lied about the matter if Datuk Seri Ahmad Faizal Azumu still remains the Mentri Besar until Wednesday (Dec 5), which is the last day of the state assembly sitting. Abdul Aziz, who is also Tebing Tinggi assemblyman, said Saarani keeps harping on plans to oust the Mentri Besar, and had allegedly mentioned his name during the sitting. “He said I ...

content.title: AirAsiaのシンガポールからイポーへの直行便が出発 -  The Star Online
content.desc: IPOH: AirAsia made its maiden direct flight from Singapore to Ipoh on Monday (Dec 3). The flight carrying 166 passengers departed from Singapore Changi Airport at 11.40am and arrived at the Sultan Azlan Shah Airport in Ipoh at 1pm. On arrival, passengers were greeted by Perak Mentri Besar Datuk Seri Ahmad Faizal Azumu. Also present were state Tourism, Arts and Culture Committee chairman Tan Kar Hing, state Housing and Local Government Committee chairman Paul Yong Choo Kiong, Tourism Perak chief executive officer Zuraida Md Taib and AirAsia chief executive officer Riad Asmat. Ahmad Faizal sa...
